Happy Birthaday to an amazing soul who always seeks to make everyone around him happy. I pray that on this day, you are at peace as the All Father blesses you abundantly for the rest of your daysAnd please do not stop being amazing good man. You are destined for great things on this earth dear Lord Bee.

Chinaza, Zeus, 413
